value.title: Coronavirus: UK detention centres 'emptied in weeks'
value.excerpt: The number of people held in UK immigration removal centres has dropped by more than two thirds during the pandemic, figures reveal. More than 700 detainees were released between 16 March and 21 April as the government responded to concerns about the spread of infection.
